Year: 1989
Country: USA
Language: English
Distributor: Caballero Home Video
Director: Gerard Damiano

Starring: Britt Morgan, Holly Daze, Kassi Nova, Sharon Kane, Billy Dee, Jace Rocker, Jesse Eastern, Mike Horner, Peter North, Randy West

Description: Oh, woe is me, cries Paula Peril. Dan Dastardly is going to foreclose on our bean farm if we don't come up with the cash! But Paula (Britt Morgan) uses her body as well as her head to outfox despicable Dan. Getting a job at a whorehouse run by Miss Lotta (Sharon Kane), Paula becomes the star hooker and makes money fast! The sex is nonstop, fast and furious as Paula bangs her way to freedom. But is there enough time? Will dashing Jack Jolly succumb to a torrid tarts temptations? Can Paula handle the orgy Dan Dastardly plans for her? And, can Pops Peril still get it up to save the day? All these questions (and more!) will be answered in The Perils Of Paula. This erotic melodrama replaces booing and hissing with moaning and groaning!
